heroMainTitle.subtitle: I'm a #Frontend Developer# specializing in building responsive and modern web applications using React, Next.js, and CSS frameworks. I focus on delivering clean, efficient code and seamless user experiences.

aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.subtitle: Transforming ideas into beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using React and Next.js.
aboutUs.description: I specialize in building modern websites with clean code, performance optimization, and seamless user experiences. In my journey, I have worked on WordPress customizations, PHP projects, and now focus on React & Next.js development in CRM applications.
aboutUs.mission: To create websites that combine functionality, aesthetics, and performance.
aboutUs.cta: Let's collaborate and bring your ideas to life!
